name: SledFree2
description:
The sequel to last year's AGDG SledFree.
The aim of the game is to avoid obstacles while you race your sled downhill in a variety of exciting game modes.

Original
Travel down an endless slope scoring points as you go. Extra points are awarded for air time and tight manoeuvres.

Race
Reach the finish line ahead of your opponents.

Avalanche
See how long you can outrun the deadly avalanche.

Slalom
Avoid obstacles and pass between pairs of flags on your way to the finish line.
